## `SetTextStorageMethod`

Sets whether new projects embed their documents or link to them.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetTextStorageMethod(TextStorage storage)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`TextStorage`](#textstorage) storage | How projects should embed or link to their documents. |
:::
